page.title: 11Barn Owls
page.content: It all started when Mr Marney came jogging past our school and stopped for breath.Teresa Deasy shouted him on and the next thing we knew he came into school with his animals and told us stories about various animals he had looked after in the past. About the owls He had got 2 Barn owl that had been hurt in the wild,John kept the owls.1 was a male and 1 was a female,They were soon well.They mated and incubated the eggs.They hatched and sadly the owls were'nt capable of looking after them,themselves.The chicks died and the next year they laid more eggs,4 of them hatched and Annie,Johns helper fed the owlets on cut up chicks and fed them with care and patience.This time they lived to be strong and healthy.(Cont.at 12,13)
